title: Magna International to build hybrid transmissions for BMW
text:
Magna International to build hybrid transmissions for BMW

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 10:03)

Magna International to build hybrid transmissions for BMW Oct 30 (Reuters) - Canadian auto-parts maker Magna International MGA.N said on Wednesday it would build dual-clutch and hybrid transmissions for German carmaker BMW under a multi-year contract. The products will be built at Magna's plants in Germany and Slovakia, the company said. Magna did not disclose the financial terms of the contract.
